title: Wire user-provided cover and author portrait images as static assets

requirements.summary: Add the uploaded Torment cover and author portrait images as static public assets with normalized filenames and wire them into the UI via content references.
acceptanceCriteria: The repository contains the two uploaded images saved under frontend/public in a stable location (e.g., /assets/uploads/) with normalized filenames (kebab-case, no spaces).
The Torment book entry is updated to use the new Torment cover asset path.
The About page portrait is updated to use the new author portrait asset path.
The app loads with no broken image URLs in Home, Books, or About pages.

file_operations.description: Add the user-uploaded Torment cover image (source upload: "image.png") as a static public asset with a web-safe kebab-case filename.
Add the user-uploaded author portrait image (source upload: "Jeffrey Butler profile image.png") as a static public asset with a web-safe kebab-case filename.
Update references so the Torment book cover and About page portrait use the new static asset paths under /assets/uploads/.

requirements.summary: Update siteContent to point Torment cover and author portrait to the new static asset paths while leaving the second book cover unchanged unless a second uploaded asset exists.
acceptanceCriteria: siteContent.books entry with id "torment" has coverImage updated to the new uploaded cover path.
siteContent.about.portraitImage is updated to the new uploaded author image path.
siteContent.books entry with id "coming-soon" continues to reference the existing placeholder cover image path unless a second uploaded cover asset exists in the repo and is explicitly wired up.
HomePage and BooksPage render the updated Torment cover, and AboutPage renders the updated author portrait.

file_operations.description: Set siteContent.books[id="torment"].coverImage to "/assets/uploads/torment-cover.png" and siteContent.about.portraitImage to "/assets/uploads/jeffrey-butler-profile-image.png"; keep coming-soon coverImage unchanged.
